subject: Broken pedal while driving
description_text:
I purchased these pedals through your Amazon store July 24. They were great
but tonight the brake pedal load cell completely sheared off the housing.
The bolts snapped in the middle of my race.

I’m not sure how long the warranty is, please any help would be
appreciated. I’ve attached pictures of the damage and my original invoice.

Please please help

conversations.body_text: Hi William Weaver,    Please provide your contact name, phone number, and address, and we will send you a new PlusX brake pedal as a replacement. This kind of M6 screw breakage is quite rare. If you usually apply strong force, could you please confirm whether you are using the blue damping elastomer? We will also enhance our screw quality inspection to prevent similar issues in the future. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Wow amazing thank you so much you have made my day. I’ve praised your
products to anyone who will listen. This just emphasizes my thoughts.

My contact info is
William Weaver
160 Simsbury Ct.
Pickerington, OH 43147
614-804-0781

On Fri, Oct 24, 2025 at 10:04 PM service@simsonn.com

Also I was using the black elastomer. I can switch to the blue on the new
pedal if this is your recommendation

Hi William Weaver,    Yes, each damper color corresponds to a specific resistance range within a limited stroke.  Using a mismatched damper and resistance level may cause damage.  I will send you a replacement tomorrow and provide the tracking number once it’s shipped.

with my current control box? I know there were some updates on that.
